{"data": {"production":{"id":"black_sea","production_title":"Black Sea","production_status":3,"production_desc":"

Two-time Academy Award nominee Jude Law captains the cast of Black Sea<\/em>, the suspenseful adventure thriller directed by Academy Award winner Kevin Macdonald (One Day in September<\/em>, The Last King of Scotland<\/em>).<\/p>

Black Sea<\/em> centers on a rogue submarine captain (Jude Law) who, after being laid off from a salvage company, pulls together a misfit crew to go after a sunken treasure rumored to be lost in the depths of the Black Sea. As greed and desperation take control on board their claustrophobic vessel, the increasing uncertainty of the mission causes the men to turn on each other to fight for their own survival.<\/p>

The cast also includes Scoot McNairy (Argo<\/em>), British Independent Film Award winner Ben Mendelsohn (Starred Up<\/em>), David Threlfall (Shameless<\/em>), Konstantin Khabenskiy (Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy<\/em>), Sergey Puskepalis (How I Ended This Summer<\/em>), British Independent Film Award winner Michael Smiley (Kill List<\/em>), and Grigory Dobrygin (A Most Wanted Man<\/em>).<\/p>","in_theaters":"
